summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting deeds for street purposes, an easement for street purposes, an easement for sanitary sewer and an easement for sidewalk ramp, all in Block 31, Boulevard Place Addition, Block 28, Bell and Denny's 1st Addition, Block 13, Replat of Blocks 1,2,6,7,134,14 and 23, North Seattle, and Block 138, A.A. Denny's Broadway Addition, laying off Aurora Avenue North, Bell Street, the alley in Block 28 of Bell and Denny's 1st Addition, West Mercer Street and the alley in Block 13, Replat of Blocks, 1,2,6,7,13 14 and 23, North Seattle and assigning jurisdiction thereof (RW 8972, RW 8927, RW 8970 and RW 8971).
